sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"不同的"之意。
means: different ： 普通用词，强调事物间的区别或本质的不同。有时侧重对比，不着重差别。
various ： 通常强调种类的数目。
diverse ： 语气较强，指性质完全不同，着重显著的区别。

sentence.Network_en: Specialists see various reasons for the recent surge in inflation.
sentence.Network_cn: 专家们认为目前通货膨胀加剧有多种原因。

sentence.Network_en: They've linked her with various men, including magnate Donald Trump.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们把她与不同的男人扯上关系，包括大亨唐纳德·特朗普。

sentence.Network_en: They've been living and working peacefully with members of various ethnic groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们和不同民族的人们一起和睦地生活和工作。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin varius 'changing, diverse' + -ous

encyclopedia.content: 词典解释 语法标注解释 various英音：['vɛəriəs] 形容词 1. 不同的；各种各样的，形形色色的Everyone arrived late at the party for various reasons. 由于种种原因，每个人赴会都迟到了。 2. 好几个的；许多的[Z]Wheat is grown in various parts of the country. 全国许多地方都种小麦。 网络释义 various 1. 各种各样的；不同种类的 人教版高中英语高三第二单元Unit2词汇速。..2. various adj.各

entry.tran: 各种各样的;不同种类的
entry.def: If you say that there are various things, you mean there are several different things of the type mentioned.

example.ex: His plan is to spread the capital between various building society accounts...
example.tran: 他打算把资金分散存到不同的购房互助会的账户上。

example.ex: The school has received various grants from the education department.
example.tran: 学校得到了教育部门的多项资助。

entry.def: If a number of things are described as various, they are very different from one another.

example.ex: The methods are many and various.

means.word_mean: 1. of many different kinds purposefully arranged but lacking any uniformity;

sentences.sentence: "various experiments have failed to disprove the theory"
"celebrities as diverse as Bob Hope and Bob Dylan"
"animals as various as the jaguar and the cavy and the sloth"

auth_sentence.content: Later, he invited various UK-based musicians to contribute.
auth_sentence.res_content: Later, he invited various UK-based musicians to contribute.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Later, he invited various UK-based musicians to contribute.

auth_sentence.content: NHS managers say various factors contributed to the suspension.
auth_sentence.res_content: NHS managers say various factors contributed to the suspension.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: NHS managers say various factors contributed to the suspension.

auth_sentence.content: There are various reasons that birds sing at dawn.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are various reasons that birds sing at dawn.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are various reasons that birds sing at dawn.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有多种形态的, 形状不同的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vari变化+form形状→有多种形状,形状不同的
vari变化+able……的→易变的;可变的;变量的
vari变化+ous……的→adj.各种各样的;不同的
variegate弄出杂色+ion表名词→n.彩色斑驳
vari变化+able……的→易变的;可变的;变量的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 变化, 多样性, 种种, 品种, 种类
stems_affixes.word_buile: vari变化+ety表名词→n.变化, 多样性, 种种, 品种, 种类
vari变化+eg=ag+ate表动词→做出变化→弄出杂色
pre预先+vari变化+cate=ate表动词→预先想好了变化之词→说谎

Sentence.sentence: The boot time is pretty fast, and he navigates through (浏览 ) a few chapters before swiping into a fully rendered 3D molecule that can be spun around to view its various building blocks.
He studied the designs of various choices.
The gastro-pub has existed in various locations in Hong Kong since 2002.

Smith has written a breezy guidebook, with a series of short chapters dedicated to specific aspects of urbanity - parks, say, or the various schemes that have been put forward over the years for building the perfect city.
As they walk around a playground or other area, text, video or audio pops up at various points to help them try to figure out why aliens were in the schoolyard
It enables people to look into various possibilities and choose the career they love.

means.word_mean: 各种不同的, 各种各样的

sentences.en: The subject may be viewed in various ways.
sentences.cn: 这问题可以从不同的方面加以考虑。

sentences.en: The products we sell are many and various.
sentences.cn: 我们出售的产品是各式各样的。

sentences.en: There are various ways to solve the problem.
sentences.cn: 解决这个问题有许多种方法。

jushi.english: The various forces to a large degree cancelled out.
jushi.chinese: 在很大程度上这些不同的力互相抵消了。

jushi.english: The subject may be viewed in various ways.
jushi.chinese: 这问题可以从不同的方面加以考虑。

jushi.english: Various people said they had seen the accident.
jushi.chinese: 许多人说他们目睹了这次事故。
